author: perrotta
body:
I could not resist and I fixed an issue ("Value stored to 'distance_min' is never read" in corrispondence of previous L402 of RecoLocalTracker/SiPixelRecHits/src/PixelCPETemplateReco.cc), also profiting for simplifying a bit the code and avoiding useless calculation of a few square roots.

I only looked at that block, and I did not intervene in the overall logic of the code: nothing must change in the outputs.

This should not interfere with #20904, but to be sure I will not sign it until that one is merged in 94X

@ahinzmann
title: Solve an issue spot by the Static Analyzer in PixelCPETemplateReco.cc
